//#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#include <set>
using namespace std;
#define w(t) while(t--)
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define SLL(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define P(x) printf("%d",x)
#define fl(i , a, b) for(i = (int)a; i<(int)b; i++)
#define mem(a , value) memset(a , value , sizeof(a))
#define tr(c, itr) for(itr = (c).begin(); itr != (c).end(); itr++)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX 1000000010
#define ll long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
typedef pair<int,int> pp;
ll f[1234567];
int main()
{
	int x , y  , n; 
	//std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin >> x >> y;
	f[1] = 1;
	for ( n = 0; n <=y; ++n)
	{
		if(n%2==0)
			f[n] = f[n/2];
		else
		{
			f[n] = f[n-1] + 1;
		}
	}
	ll maxi= 0; 
	for(n = x ; n <= y ; n++)
		maxi = max(maxi , f[n]);
	cout<<maxi << endl;
	return 0;
}
